code: import axios from'axios';export var GET_POKEMONS='GET_POKEMONS';export var GET_DETAIL='GET_DETAIL';export var GET_POKEMONS_NAME='GET_POKEMONS_NAME';export var CREATE_POKEMON='CREATE_POKEMON';export var GET_TYPES='GET_TYPES';export var SET_LOADING='SET_LOADING';export var DEL_POKEMON='DEL_POKEMON';export var POKE_TO_MODIFY='POKE_TO_MODIFY';export var CLEAN_POKE_MODIFY='CLEAN_POKE_MODIFY';export var getPokemons=function getPokemons(){return function(dispatch){return axios('http://localhost:3001/pokemons').then(function(data){return data.data;}).then(function(data){return dispatch({type:GET_POKEMONS,payload:data});});};};export var getDetail=function getDetail(id){return function(dispatch){return axios("http://localhost:3001/pokemons/".concat(id)).then(function(data){return data.data;}).then(function(data){return dispatch({type:GET_DETAIL,payload:data});});};};export var getPokemonName=function getPokemonName(name){return function(dispatch){return axios("http://localhost:3001/pokemons?name=".concat(name)).then(function(data){return data.data;}).then(function(data){return dispatch({type:GET_POKEMONS_NAME,payload:data});});};};export var getTypes=function getTypes(){return function(dispatch){return axios("http://localhost:3001/types/get").then(function(data){return data.data;}).then(function(data){return dispatch({type:GET_TYPES,payload:data});});};};export var createPokemon=function createPokemon(pokemonCreate){return function(dispatch){return axios.post("http://localhost:3001/pokemons",pokemonCreate).then(function(data){return data.data;}).then(function(data){return dispatch({type:CREATE_POKEMON,payload:data});});};};export var deletePoke=function deletePoke(name){return function(dispatch){return axios.delete("http://localhost:3001/pokemons/delete/?name=".concat(name)).then(function(data){return data.data;}).then(function(data){return dispatch({type:DEL_POKEMON});});};};export var modifyPoke=function modifyPoke(name){return function(dispatch){return dispatch({type:POKE_TO_MODIFY});};};export var cleanPokeModify=function cleanPokeModify(){return function(dispatch){return dispatch({type:CLEAN_POKE_MODIFY,payload:[]});};};
